Text: Post Correction: Not the title track, i copied and pasted the Heartbeat City post text and forgot to change that part '.'

I have the VHS of Heartbeat City, but i am sure this will be better quality .. BOY didn't that cd get a flogging back in the 80's .. Excellent upload as usual ... worth waiting for fellow uploaders ...

These rips are from a 2.5 GB laserdisc rip i have which i could never get a good single song copy rip from without it being out of sync, until now with this new program i used. These mp4's ended up playing better than the original rip, which has a lot of scanline issues during playback.
